AD_SawWildshapeOrSummon.synopsis: Generic. Reaction in the Druid Grove to wildshapes/summons that normally ellicit an agitated reaction. Here people are more relaxed since they're used to it, given their surrounds. Note that these are not applicable for druid npcs.

AD_SawWildshapeOrSummon_0.speaker: GROUP_Animals, GROUP_Bugbear, GROUP_Constructs, GROUP_Daisy, GROUP_Demons, GROUP_Desire, GROUP_Dragons, GROUP_Dwarves, GROUP_Elves, GROUP_Gith, GROUP_Gnolls, GROUP_Gnomes, GROUP_Goblins, GROUP_HalfElves, GROUP_Halflings, GROUP_Hobgoblin, GROUP_Humans, GROUP_Ogres, GROUP_Origins, GROUP_SmartUndead, GROUP_Tiefling, GROUP_Trolls
AD_SawWildshapeOrSummon_0.text: I wish I had one of those.
AD_SawWildshapeOrSummon_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Child NPC of any race/species/gender

AD_SawWildshapeOrSummon_1.speaker: GROUP_Animals, GROUP_Bugbear, GROUP_Constructs, GROUP_Daisy, GROUP_Demons, GROUP_Desire, GROUP_Dragons, GROUP_Dwarves, GROUP_Elves, GROUP_Gith, GROUP_Gnolls, GROUP_Gnomes, GROUP_Goblins, GROUP_HalfElves, GROUP_Halflings, GROUP_Hobgoblin, GROUP_Humans, GROUP_Ogres, GROUP_Origins, GROUP_SmartUndead, GROUP_Tiefling, GROUP_Trolls
AD_SawWildshapeOrSummon_1.text: Wouldn't want to bump into you in a dark wood.
